tool_description: Combines all invoice components including customer data, line items, taxes, discounts, branding, and terms into a complete invoice structure ready for formatting and delivery.

line_items.description: Array of formatted line items with pricing

payment_terms.description: Payment terms and due date information

notes.description: Additional notes or terms to include on invoice

reference_number.description: Customer reference or purchase order number

error_messages: Missing required components: One or more required invoice components are missing or invalid. Ensure all required data is provided.
Line items validation failed: Line items contain invalid data or calculations. Verify line item formatting and calculations.
Tax calculation mismatch: Tax calculations do not align with line items. Recalculate taxes based on current line items.
Template structure invalid: Template structure is corrupted or incompatible. Load a valid template structure.
Currency format invalid: Currency code must be a valid ISO 4217 code. Provide a standard currency code.
usage: Provide all required invoice components including customer_data, company_branding, invoice_number, line_items, tax_information, payment_terms, template_structure, and invoice_date. The tool will validate and assemble a complete invoice.

complete_invoice.description: Assembled complete invoice structure with all components integrated

invoice_summary.description: Summary of invoice totals and key information

validation_status.description: Validation status of the assembled invoice

total_amount.description: Final total amount of the invoice including taxes
